Side Effects: body-wide twitching_ burning muscles_ freezing/burning thighs and shins_ numbness and tingling in legs_ burning right shoulder_ dry eyes_ panic attacks_ burning joints_ popping joints. FOR TWO YEARS NOW
Comments: I still can't believe that all of these can be caused by such low dose of Cipro. I was told to use it for 7 days but used it for two months. Maybe everything is a coincidence and I have Sjogren's or Lyme Disease (I have been tested negative for both)
